wikipedia_page.main: Frederick Nicholas Thorp (born 7 March 1994) is an English actor. He starred in the 2017 action film Overdrive, as well as the Netflix series Safe and Fate: The Winx Saga.

response: In 2018 he directed the drama film Summit Fever starring Freddie Thorp and Emma Tachard-Mackey.http://www.carnabysales.com/film/summit-fever/https://variety.com/2018/film/news/carnaby-international-adds-three-genre-titles-cannes-slate-1202802500/

On 7 June 2016, it was announced that Colourful Radio signed an exclusive deal to provide live outside broadcasts of the BUFF 2016 press conference and Script Reading competition from Channel 4 headquarters. On 4 July 2016, it was announced that To Dream is to open the 2016 British Urban Film Festival at the Odeon Cinemas in Camden Town. The film stars Ed Hayter, Freddie Thorp, Diana Vickers and Adam Deacon. On 14 July 2016, it was announced that BBC Films is to sponsor the BUFF Awards 2016 (in the "best emerging talent" category), the showpiece event in its annual British Urban Film Festival.

link_mentions.page: List of action films of the 2010s

response: Overdrive is a 2017 action thriller film directed by Antonio Negret, produced by Michael Brandt, Derek Haas and Pierre Morel and the screenplay was written by Michael Brandt and Derek Haas. The film stars are Scott Eastwood, Freddie Thorp, Ana de Armas and Gaia Weiss. Principal photography began on 4 January 2016 in Paris and Marseille, France. The film tells the story of skilled car thieves who are sent to steal a crime lord's luxury car.
* Freddie Thorp as Garret Foster, Andrew's younger half-brother
* Freddie Thorp as Chris Chahal, Zoé and Neil's son, and Jenny's 19-year-old boyfriend

* Freddie Thorp as Riven, a second-year Specialist student who is Sky's best friend. He is romantically involved with Beatrix, while taking Dane under his wing.
